archimate:SystemSoftware.documentation:
Workflow Engine
• Purpose: Orchestrate complex business processes spanning multiple systems • Capabilities: Process definition, task management, human workflow, system automation • Patterns: Sequential workflows, parallel processing, conditional logic, error handling • Examples: Patient admission workflow, clinical order processing, insurance authorization • Technology: Apache Airflow, Camunda, Microsoft Workflow Foundation, custom engines • Benefits: Process standardization, automation, visibility, compliance, efficiency
